docs.lead_paragraph: Despite years of efforts to reduce obesity, federal health officials reported Thursday that the share of Americans who were obese increased slightly.

headline.main: Obesity Rises Despite All Efforts to Fight It, U.S. Health Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Obesity Rises Despite Efforts to Fight It

docs.abstract: Latest National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey shows no decline in percentage of Americans who are obese, with adults ages 40 to 59 showing highest rate of obesity; health officials express dismay at latest figures, given years of federal effort by nutritiional experts to reverse trend.
docs.snippet: Despite years of efforts to reduce obesity, federal health officials reported Thursday that the share of Americans who were obese increased slightly.

keywords.value: National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Serena Williams is the top tennis player in the world and an emerging fashion designer. But she still needs something to do in that down time between matches. That's where the pre-med classes come in.

docs.lead_paragraph: Facing anti-Semitism in Ukraine, Dora and Motel Shkolnick obtained visas to come to the United States in 1973 with hopes of creating a better future for their children.

headline.main: Seeking a Better Life While Trying to Forget the ‘Long, Terrible Years’ of the Holocaust
headline.print_headline: Trying to Forget Holocaust While Creating Better Life

docs.abstract: UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides Holocaust survivors Dora and Motel Shkolnick with funds to help live in their apartment in Brighton Beach, Brooklyn.
docs.snippet: Facing anti-Semitism in Ukraine, Dora and Motel Shkolnick obtained visas to come to the United States in 1973 with hopes of creating a better future for their children.

docs.lead_paragraph: South Koreans, who traditionally eat most meals with a generous dollop of the fiery local side dish kimchi, are gaining a growing taste for another imported fermented food: cheese.

headline.main: Cutting Down on the Spice, South Korea Cheese Imports Soar as Trade Deals Open Door
headline.print_headline: Cutting Down on the Spice, South Korea Cheese Imports Soar as Trade Deals Open Door

docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands have fled tribal fighting, lawlessness and food shortages in eastern Mali in recent weeks, and the number of Malian refugees in Niger is now the largest since Mali's conflict erupted in 2012, the United Nations said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Number of Malian Refugees in Niger Hits Post-Conflict High-U.N.
headline.print_headline: Number of Malian Refugees in Niger Hits Post-Conflict High-U.N.

docs.snippet: Thousands have fled tribal fighting, lawlessness and food shortages in eastern Mali in recent weeks, and the number of Malian refugees in Niger is now the largest since Mali's conflict erupted in 2012, the United Nations said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Placing a Cap on Americans’ Consumption of Added Sugar
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Seeks to Slow the Pour of Sugar

docs.abstract: The goal of new F.D.A. guidelines is to limit added sugar to no more than 10 percent of daily calories. For an adult, that means no more than 12.5 teaspoons a day.
docs.snippet: The goal of new F.D.A. guidelines is to limit added sugar to no more than 10 percent of daily calories. For an adult, that means no more than 12.5 teaspoons a day.
